tools.name: bible.semantic_search
tools.description: Semantic search across 116k Bible verses using BGE-M3 embeddings and pgvector similarity

tools.name: bible.cross_language
tools.description: Find cross-language semantic connections between Hebrew and Greek words using vector similarity

tools.name: bible.lexicon_lookup
tools.description: Look up Strong's lexicon entries with definitions, transliterations, and usage information

tools.name: bible.verse_insights
tools.description: Get contextual insights for a Bible verse including translations, lexicon entries, similar verses, and AI-synthesized commentary

tools.name: query-gematria-nodes
tools.description: Query nodes from the gematria concept network graph (GenAI Toolbox)

tools.name: query-bible-verses
tools.description: Query Bible verses from the bible_db database (GenAI Toolbox)

endpoints.notes: Query parameter: q (search query), limit (default 20), translation (default KJV)
